mapper.select: select no, title, s.lang, s.result, s.runtime, s.memory, submit_at, score from Problem left outer join (select * from Submit where (stud_id, problemNo, submit_at) in (select stud_id, problemNo, max(submit_at) latest_at from Submit where stud_id = #{studId} group by problemNo)) s on no = s.problemNo

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.no p_no, t.id t_no, #{submitId} submit_id FROM Problem p JOIN Testcase t ON p.no = t.problem_id WHERE t.isPublic = 1 ) stp LEFT OUTER JOIN Testcase_judge tj ON stp.t_no = tj.testcase_id AND stp.submit_id = tj.submit_id ORDER BY stp.t_no asc, tj.id asc
